name: air-conc-aqi-converter
description: Converts to and from air pollutants' concentration values and AQI values

scripts.test-iaqi: npm run build && mocha dist/test/calcIaqi.test.js || true
scripts.test-kr: npm run build && mocha dist/test/krAqi.test.js || true
scripts.test-level: npm run build && mocha dist/test/getLevelByAqi.test.js || true
scripts.test-pos: npm run build && mocha dist/test/posInLevel.test.js || true
scripts.test-all: npm run build && mocha dist/**/*.js || true

author: Herbert Lim
